file.name: header_scenario12.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: PayloadV
  version: 0.0.0
servers:
  - url: "{server}:{port}/payloadV"
    variables:
      server:
        default: http://localhost
      port:
        default: "9090"
paths:
  /ping:
    get:
      operationId: operation_get_/ping
      parameters:
        - name: x-client
          in: header
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: boolean
            default: "[true, false]"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Ok
components: {}
